segments.content: This Week In React #115: Astro, Radix, Remix, Next.js, MDX, Storybook, Expo 46, Skia, TanStack, TC39, Docusaurus...
segments.sourceMdx: This Week In React #115: Astro, Radix, Remix, Next.js, MDX, Storybook, Expo 46, Skia, TanStack, TC39, Docusaurus...

segments.content: <!-- truncate -->
segments.sourceMdx: <!-- truncate -->

segments.content: Hi everyone!
segments.sourceMdx: Hi everyone!

segments.content: Following the successful launch of Docusaurus 2.0, I didn't have time to send out the newsletter scheduled for earlier this week 😅
segments.sourceMdx: Following the successful launch of Docusaurus 2.0, I didn't have time to send out the newsletter scheduled for earlier this week 😅
segments.translated_content: 随着Docusaurus 2.0的成功发布，我实在抽不出时间按原计划在本周早些时候发送这份通讯 😅

segments.content: This is another special edition, on a Friday night, covering almost 3 weeks of news, and a lot has happened!
segments.sourceMdx: This is another special edition, on a Friday night, covering almost 3 weeks of news, and a lot has happened!
segments.translated_content: 这是周五晚间的特别版，涵盖近三周的动态——期间发生了太多事情！

segments.content: Impossible to read everything or comment 😬. I made the choice to be exhaustive and include all the links that seemed interesting to me, without necessarily commenting on them. I would already have to read them myself before 😅 a bit overwhelmed now.
segments.sourceMdx: Impossible to read everything or comment 😬. I made the choice to be exhaustive and include all the links that seemed interesting to me, without necessarily commenting on them. I would already have to read them myself before 😅 a bit overwhelmed now.
segments.translated_content: 实在无法逐一阅读或点评所有内容 😬。我选择尽可能全面地收录所有看似有趣的链接，暂不作评论。毕竟我自己也得先消化这些内容 😅 现在确实有点应接不暇。

segments.content: During this month of August, I will focus on my Revue migration to ConvertKit. The next edition will be around August 20th, but it's also possible I skip it and won't send anything until early September.
segments.sourceMdx: During this month of August, I will focus on my Revue migration to ConvertKit. The next edition will be around August 20th, but it's also possible I skip it and won't send anything until early September.
segments.translated_content: 八月份我将专注于将Revue迁移至ConvertKit的工作。下一期通讯预计在8月20日左右发布，但也可能跳过这期直接到九月初再恢复更新。

segments.content: Anyway, since we won't see each other for a while, at least you'll have something to read this summer 🤣
segments.sourceMdx: Anyway, since we won't see each other for a while, at least you'll have something to read this summer 🤣
segments.translated_content: 无论如何，既然我们要暂别一段时间，至少这个夏天你们有足够多的阅读材料了 🤣

segments.content: ## React
segments.sourceMdx: ## React

segments.content: [**Announcing Docusaurus 2.0**](https://docusaurus.io/blog/2022/08/01/announcing-docusaurus-2.0?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React\&utm_medium=email\&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
segments.sourceMdx: [**Announcing Docusaurus 2.0**](https://docusaurus.io/blog/2022/08/01/announcing-docusaurus-2.0?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)

segments.content: Docusaurus is the React framework I'm working on with Meta. We just released v2.0. Very happy with this release which has been relayed all over! 💝 Thanks so much for participating and contributing to the success! 🙏 Useful links:
segments.sourceMdx: Docusaurus is the React framework I'm working on with Meta. We just released v2.0. Very happy with this release which has been relayed all over! 💝 Thanks so much for participating and contributing to the success! 🙏 Useful links:
segments.translated_content: Docusaurus是我与Meta共同维护的React框架。我们刚刚发布了v2.0版本。对这个获得广泛传播的版本非常满意！💝 衷心感谢各位的参与和贡献！🙏 实用链接：

segments.content: A daily newsletter with three curated technical deep-dives on all things software engineering.
segments.sourceMdx: A daily newsletter with three curated technical deep-dives on all things software engineering.
segments.translated_content: 每日推送三篇精选技术深度文章，涵盖软件工程各领域。

segments.content: [G2i: 100% Remote JavaScript Jobs](https://welcome.g2i.co/apply?campaign=marketing-partner-newsletters\&utm_campaign=Marketing%20Partner%20Newsletters\&utm_medium=email\&utm_source=TWIR)
segments.sourceMdx: [G2i: 100% Remote JavaScript Jobs](https://welcome.g2i.co/apply?campaign=marketing-partner-newsletters&utm_campaign=Marketing%20Partner%20Newsletters&utm_medium=email&utm_source=TWIR)

segments.content: G2i is the only hiring platform that puts developer health first. We connect React and React Native freelancers with great companies committed to improving developers' mental, physical, and emotional health and well-being. [Apply to join](https://welcome.g2i.co/apply?campaign=marketing-partner-newsletters\&utm_campaign=Marketing%20Partner%20Newsletters\&utm_medium=email\&utm_source=TWIR) today.
segments.sourceMdx: G2i is the only hiring platform that puts developer health first. We connect React and React Native freelancers with great companies committed to improving developers' mental, physical, and emotional health and well-being. [Apply to join](https://welcome.g2i.co/apply?campaign=marketing-partner-newsletters&utm_campaign=Marketing%20Partner%20Newsletters&utm_medium=email&utm_source=TWIR) today.
segments.translated_content: G2i是唯一将开发者健康置于首位的招聘平台。我们为React和React Native自由职业者对接注重开发者心理、生理及情感健康的企业。[立即申请加入](https://welcome.g2i.co/apply?campaign=marketing-partner-newsletters&utm_campaign=Marketing%20Partner%20Newsletters&utm_medium=email&utm_source=TWIR)。

segments.content: Gabe Greenberg, founder of G2i, has launched a fund on [**developerhealth.org**](https://developerhealth.org/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React\&utm_medium=email\&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter) to provide financial assistance for the dev community. Developer are welcome to apply and use the fund for counseling/therapy, paid time between freelance projects, loan assistance, child care services, medical visits and expenses, etc.
segments.sourceMdx: Gabe Greenberg, founder of G2i, has launched a fund on [**developerhealth.org**](https://developerhealth.org/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter) to provide financial assistance for the dev community. Developer are welcome to apply and use the fund for counseling/therapy, paid time between freelance projects, loan assistance, child care services, medical visits and expenses, etc.
segments.translated_content: G2i创始人Gabe Greenberg在[**developerhealth.org**](https://developerhealth.org/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)设立基金，为开发者社区提供心理咨询/治疗、自由职业项目间过渡期补助、贷款援助、育儿服务、医疗就诊等经济支持。

segments.content: ## React-Native
segments.sourceMdx: ## React-Native

segments.content: [**Pedal to the Metal**](https://www.youtube.com/watch?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React\&utm_medium=email\&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter\&v=uvLQ5f3KDXk)
segments.sourceMdx: [**Pedal to the Metal**](https://www.youtube.com/watch?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter&v=uvLQ5f3KDXk)

segments.content: 🤯 This video by William Candillon is my favorite! You must watch it even if it's just for the intro, and the quality of the production👌 It includes the latest news of React-Native-Skia which goes into alpha, is included in Expo Go via Expo SDK 46, supports Snack, supports the web (with a Remotion starter), not to mention the perf improvements on the reconciler... In short, it moves fast and this is very exciting! It's also a nice collaboration with Shopify, Expo, Google, Remotion...
segments.sourceMdx: 🤯 This video by William Candillon is my favorite! You must watch it even if it's just for the intro, and the quality of the production👌 It includes the latest news of React-Native-Skia which goes into alpha, is included in Expo Go via Expo SDK 46, supports Snack, supports the web (with a Remotion starter), not to mention the perf improvements on the reconciler... In short, it moves fast and this is very exciting! It's also a nice collaboration with Shopify, Expo, Google, Remotion...
segments.translated_content: 🤯 William Candillon制作的这段视频堪称我的最爱！即便只为片头和制作水准也值得一看👌 内容涵盖React-Native-Skia最新进展：进入alpha阶段、通过Expo SDK 46集成至Expo Go、支持Snack、支持Web端（提供Remotion入门模板），更不用说协调器性能提升... 发展迅猛令人振奋！这也是与Shopify、Expo、Google、Remotion的精彩合作成果！
